name: RELX Group
goal: RELX Group is a global provider of information and analytics for professional and business customers across industries. We help scientists make new discoveries, lawyers win cases, doctors save lives and insurance companies offer customers lower prices. We save taxpayers and consumers money by preventing fraud and help executives forge commercial relationships with their clients. In short, we enable our customers to make better decisions, get better results and be more productive.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Education, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Information Society, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology, Taxation
euInitiatives:
copyright framework - InfoSoc Directive
research - Science 2.0, Horizon 2020
data - General Data Protection Regulation, open data, research data
smart farming
